definition: having the power or quality of deciding, a determining or causal element or factor
details:
adjective
- having the power or quality of deciding
= synonyms: deciding
noun
- a determining or causal element or factor
= example: a determining or causal element or factor
= synonyms: determinative, determiner, determining factor, causal factor
- a square matrix used to solve simultaneous equations
- the site on the surface of an antigen molecule to which an antibody attaches itself
= synonyms: antigenic determinant
